text:
[Verse]
Sunlight creeping in
Birds begin to sing
Coffee brewing slow
Lazy day we know

[Verse 2]
Couch is calling out
No plans to leave the house
Netflix marathon
All day we'll carry on

[Chorus]
Lazy Sunday morning
No need for a warning
Time just slips away
In our little hideaway

[Verse 3]
Pajamas still in play
No rush to start the day
Snacks are piling high
You and me and sky

[Bridge]
No messages to tend
Just us till day's end
Whispers soft and sweet
This day can't repeat

[Chorus]
Lazy Sunday morning
No need for a warning
Time just slips away
In our little hideaway
title: Lazy Sunday Morning
